name: Windjammers, Karnov & Friends
summary: Get ready for action in 5 all-time arcade classics for Evercade. Throw the Flying Power Disc in the highly competitive Windjammers, search for treasure with Karnov, run for your life in Atomic Runner Chelnov and take on the dreaded Lagnalok forces in Vapor Trail: Hyper Offence Formation and Rohga: Armor Force!
